page.title: 08MY HOUSE IN WIS. GREEN
page.content: We have ten rooms in our house. The living room has a T.V. The dining room is next to the living room. We have two tables for eating. The big table is for parties and Christmas and is in the dining room. The small table is in the kitchen. We nearly always have our food in the kitchen. We have a larder that has four shelves full of food and little shelves for food and drink. We have a fridge and a freezer, a cooker and a washing machine. My brother and I have separate bedrooms. My room has a chest of drawers and a wardrobe for my clothes. Sometimes our cat, Mogford, sleeps in the wardrobe. We have an attic for the stuff we do not use anymore. Our car is kept in a li
